3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Generally good, but minimal severe perspective distortion is not fully met as it's quite a flat isometric view.

geometric_accuracy.notes: Very good alignment. All rooms are present and proporitons are mostly preserved. Doors and windows are omitted.

interior_elements.notes: Most major furniture is present and correctly placed. Kitchen and bathroom elements are well represented. Scales seem appropriate.

visual_clarity.notes: Clear, readable geometry with good lighting. Background is clean.

detected_errors.description: Doors and windows are not fully rendered, only inferred by an opening in the wall.

summary: The 2D floor plan has been converted into a geometrically accurate and readable 3D isometric cutaway model, faithfully representing the layout and interior elements, although doors and windows are simplified.
